title: Amber Rose shares snaps of beau Alexander 'AE' Edwards enjoying tender father-son moment
text:
Amber Rose welcomed their little boy into the world just a few days ago.

And Alexander 'AE' Edwards is relishing every moment as a new father.

The reality star, 35, posted a heartwarming snap Tuesday of her boyfriend enjoying a tender father-son moment with their newborn child, Slash Electric.

Aww! Amber Rose posted a heartwarming snap Tuesday of her boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards enjoying a tender father-son moment with their newborn child, Slash Electric

Slash lay in bed as his father gently touched his tiny hand while gazing fondly at the adorable newborn.

The tot looked absolutely precious and was already sporting a full head of hair as he rested in bed, clad in a white onesie.

In addition to the photo, Amber posted a video of Alexander lavishing their newborn son with attention.

The music executive had his arm around the infant as he gently nuzzled the child.

Tender loving care: The music executive had his arm draped around the squirming infant

Cuddle! Edwards nuzzled the tiny tot as Amber giggled in the background

Amber could be heard in the background, giggling, as she admired the sweet display.

Alexander is clearly loving every moment as a new father.

The couple welcomed Slash less than a week ago, and Alexander was the one to do the honors and announce the birth online.

That's his boy! Alexander is clearly loving every moment as a new father

Bump in the night! Rose had been documenting her pregnancy on social media in the lead-up to giving birth

In the gushing announcement, Alexander kissed his new son on the forehead as the youngster lay swaddled in a pink and blue hospital blanket.

'Slash Electric Alexander Edwards.. the world is urs now ❤️ thank u @amberrose for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar,' Alexander wrote in the caption.

The birth of Slash now makes Amber a mother of two.

She shares six-year-old son Sebastian Thomaz with her ex-husband Wiz Khalifa.

Welcome to the world: In the gushing announcement, Alexander kissed his new son on the forehead as the youngster lay swaddled in a pink and blue hospital blanket
description: The reality star, 35, posted a heartwarming snap of her boyfriend enjoying a tender father-son moment with their newborn child Slash Electric.
